title: Learner-Centered Instructional Design for Strengthening Science-Specific Vocabulary Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level basic scientific vocabulary and job-related background knowledge
context.additional_context: Designed for office/administrative professionals, linked to science-related job roles, operating in a BYOD environment with a focus on formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners systematically acquire and utilize specialized scientific vocabulary by applying Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction model.
Learners can evaluate context-specific vocabulary usage and autonomously improve vocabulary learning strategies.
Learners quantitatively analyze vocabulary acquisition levels through pre-/post-assessments and demonstrate learning effectiveness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
